column4: Hello. I have a question. Does Ubuntu Server come with Apache 2 Web Server and ProFTP Server?
okay i will try and isntall them using the synaptics package manager. one more question...is Ubuntu Web Server like a terminal command line OS or does it have a GUI?
ack. ok im going to ge the desktop. thank you. zykotic: why must ftp die? i thought ftp is quite useful for transferring files?
